Please no text on images to explain your: Obrazy nie mogą zawierać tekstu wyjaśniającego historię

Spoil invitations that are shared public: Spoil invitations that are shared publicly. This will encourage people to share invitations privately and prevent bots from collecting invitation codes.
When you click 'Spoil' the invitation co: When you click 'Spoil' the invitation code will be activated by a random address and wasted.
Submit the form to start mining. Your no:
Submit the form to start mining. Your node has to be online
              unless you deactivate your status. Otherwise penalties might be
              charged after being offline more than 1 hour.
Your answers for the validation session: Your answers for the validation session have been submitted successfully!
Now solve bunch of flips to check its qu:
Now solve bunch of flips to check its quality. The flip is qualified
            if the majority, equals more than 2/3 participants, gives the same
            answer.

Please qualify the keywords relevance an: Please qualify the keywords relevance and submit the answers.
